mapper.select: SELECT B."serviceShuruiRyakusho" AS サービス種類略称, (CASE WHEN C."shikyuGendoTaniSu" IS NULL THEN A."shikyuGendoTaniSu" ELSE C."shikyuGendoTaniSu" END ) AS 支給限度単位数, B."serviceShuruiCd" AS サービス種類コード FROM rgdb."DbT7111ServiceShuruiShikyuGendoGaku" A INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui" B ON A."serviceShuruiCode" = B."serviceShuruiCd" AND A."tekiyoKaishiYM" = B."teikyoKaishiYM" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT7114UwanoseServiceShuruiShikyuGendoGaku" C ON C."serviceShuruiCode" = A."serviceShuruiCode" AND C."yoKaigoJotaiKubun" = A."yoKaigoJotaiKubun" AND C."rirekiNo" = A."rirekiNo" WHERE A."tekiyoKaishiYM" <= #{利用年月} AND (A."tekiyoShuryoYM" IS NULL OR A."tekiyoShuryoYM" = '' OR A."tekiyoShuryoYM" >= #{利用年月}) AND C."tekiyoKaishiYM" <= #{利用年月} AND (C."tekiyoShuryoYM" IS NULL OR C."tekiyoShuryoYM" = '' OR C."tekiyoShuryoYM" >= #{利用年月}) ORDER BY A."serviceShuruiCode" DESC

result.property: 定額利用者負担単価金額
result.column: 定額利用者負担単価金額

select.id: getサービス利用票データ

mapper.select: SELECT DbT7060KaigoJigyosha."jigyoshaName" AS 事業者, (CASE WHEN A.サービス項目コード IS NULL OR A.サービス項目コード = '' THEN DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui."serviceShuruiRyakusho" ELSE DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou."serviceNameRyaku" END ) AS サービス, A.単位 AS 単位, A.割引適用後率 AS 割引適用後率, A.割引適用後単位 AS 割引適用後単位, A.回数 AS 回数, A.種類限度超過単位 AS 種類限度超過単位, A.種類限度内単位 AS 種類限度内単位, A.単位数単価 AS 単位数単価, A.区分限度超過単位 AS 区分限度超過単位, A.区分限度内単位 AS 区分限度内単位, A.給付率 AS 給付率, A.給付計画単位数 AS 給付計画単位数, A.サービス種類コード AS サービス種類コード, A.サービス項目コード AS サービス項目コード, A.事業者コード AS 事業者コード, A.合計フラグ AS 合計フラグ, A.定額利用者負担単価金額 AS 定額利用者負担単価金額, DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou."gendogakuTaishogaiFlag" AS 限度額対象外フラグ FROM( SELECT B."serviceTeikyoJigyoshaNo" AS 事業者コード, B."serviceShuruiCode" AS サービス種類コード, B."serviceKomokuCode" AS サービス項目コード, B."taniSu" AS 単位, B."waribikiGoTekiyoRitsu" AS 割引適用後率, B."waribikiGoTekiyoTaniSu" AS 割引適用後単位, B."kaisu_Nissu" AS 回数, B."shuruiGendoChokaTaniSu_Nissu" AS 種類限度超過単位, B."shuruiGendoNaiTaniSu_Nissu" AS 種類限度内単位, B."taniSuTanka" AS 単位数単価, B."kubunGendoChokaTaniSu_Nissu" AS 区分限度超過単位, B."kubunGendoNaiTaniSu_Nissu" AS 区分限度内単位, B."kyufuRitsu" AS 給付率, B."kyufuKeikakuTaniSu" AS 給付計画単位数, B."goukeiFlag" AS 合計フラグ, NULL AS 定額利用者負担単価金額 FROM rgdb."DbT3119KyotakuKeikakuJikosakuseiKanri" AS B WHERE B."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} AND B."taishoYM" = #{対象年月} AND B."rirekiNo" = #{履歴番号} AND B."riyoYM"= #{利用年月} UNION SELECT C."serviceTeikyoJigyoshaNo" AS 事業者コード, C."serviceShuruiCode" AS サービス種類コード, C."serviceKomokuCode" AS サービス項目コード, C."taniSu" AS 単位, C."waribikiGoTekiyoRitsu" AS 割引適用後率, C."waribikiGoTekiyoTaniSu" AS 割引適用後単位, C."kaisu_Nissu" AS 回数, C."shuruiGendoChokaTaniSu_Nissu" AS 種類限度超過単位, C."shuruiGendoNaiTaniSu_Nissu" AS 種類限度内単位, C."taniSuTanka" AS 単位数単価, C."kubunGendoChokaTaniSu_Nissu" AS 区分限度超過単位, C."kubunGendoNaiTaniSu_Nissu" AS 区分限度内単位, C."kyufuRitsu" AS 給付率, C."keikakuTaniSu" AS 給付計画単位数, C."goukeiFlag" AS 合計フラグ, C."teigakuRiyoshaFutanTankaKingaku" AS 定額利用者負担単価金額 FROM rgdb."DbT3120YoboKeikakuJikoSakuseiKanri" C WHERE C."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} AND C."taishoYM" = #{対象年月} AND C."rirekiNo" = #{履歴番号} AND C."riyoYM"= #{利用年月} ) AS A INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha" AS DbT7060KaigoJigyosha ON DbT7060KaigoJigyosha."jigyoshaNo" = A.事業者コード LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou" AS DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou ON DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou."serviceShuruiCd" = A.サービス種類コード AND DbT7131KaigoServiceNaiyou."serviceKoumokuCd" = A.サービス項目コード LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui" AS DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui ON DbT7130KaigoServiceShurui."serviceShuruiCd" = A.サービス種類コード ORDER BY A.事業者コード ASC, A.サービス種類コード ASC, A.合計フラグ ASC

SELECT 限度額."shikyuGendoTaniSu" as 支給限度単位数, 二次予防事業対象者."tekiyoKaishiYMD" AS 適用開始年月日, 二次予防事業対象者."tekiyoShuryoYMD" AS 適用終了年月日 FROM rgdb."DbT7117SogoJigyoKubunShikyuGendoGaku" AS 限度額 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" AS 受給者台帳 ON 受給者台帳."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} AND 受給者台帳."yokaigoJotaiKubunCode" = 限度額."yoKaigoJotaiKubun" AND 受給者台帳."ninteiYukoKikanKaishiYMD" <= #{開始利用年月} AND (受給者台帳."ninteiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" IS NULL OR 受給者台帳."ninteiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" = '' OR 受給者台帳."ninteiYukoKikanShuryoYMD" >= #{終了利用年月}) AND 受給者台帳."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3100NijiYoboJigyoTaishosha" AS 二次予防事業対象者 ON 二次予防事業対象者."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} WHERE 限度額."tekiyoKaishiYM"<= #{利用年月} AND (限度額."tekiyoShuryoYM" IS NULL OR 限度額."tekiyoShuryoYM" = '' OR 限度額."tekiyoShuryoYM">= #{利用年月}) ORDER BY 限度額."shikyuGendoTaniSu" DESC LIMIT 1

select.id: get居宅サービス履歴一覧

mapper.select: SELECT A.対象年月, A.作成区分コード, A.事業者番号, A.事業者名, A.委託先情報者コード, A.委託先情報者名, A.開始日, A.終了日, A.届出日, A.更新日, A.最大履歴番号, A.届出区分, A.氏名, A.カナ, A.関係区分, A.電話番号, A.郵便番号, A.住所, A.居宅・総合事業区分 FROM( SELECT rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."taishoYM" AS 対象年月 , rgdb."DbT3006KyotakuKeikakuJigyoshaSakusei"."sakuseiKubunCode" AS 作成区分コード , rgdb."DbT3006KyotakuKeikakuJigyoshaSakusei"."keikakuJigyoshaNo" AS 事業者番号 , jgs."jigyoshaName" AS 事業者名 , rgdb."DbT3006KyotakuKeikakuJigyoshaSakusei"."itakusakiJigyoshaNo" AS 委託先情報者コード , itkjgs."jigyoshaName" AS 委託先情報者名 , rgdb."DbT3006KyotakuKeikakuJigyoshaSakusei"."tekiyoKaishiYMD" AS 開始日 , rgdb."DbT3006KyotakuKeikakuJigyoshaSakusei"."tekiyoShuryoYMD" AS 終了日 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeYMD" AS 届出日 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."lastUpdateTimestamp" AS 更新日 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."rirekiNo" AS 最大履歴番号 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeKubun" AS 届出区分 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeshaShimei" AS 氏名 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeshaShimeiKana" AS カナ , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeshaKankeiKubun" AS 関係区分 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeshaTelNo" AS 電話番号 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeshaYubinNo" AS 郵便番号 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeshaJusho" AS 住所 , '' AS 居宅・総合事業区分 , row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."hihokenshaNo", rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."taishoYM" ORDER BY rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."rirekiNo" DESC) AS 履歴順 FROM rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3006KyotakuKeikakuJigyoshaSakusei" ON rgdb."DbT3006KyotakuKeikakuJigyoshaSakusei"."hihokenshaNo" = rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."hihokenshaNo" AND rgdb."DbT3006KyotakuKeikakuJigyoshaSakusei"."taishoYM" = rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."taishoYM" AND rgdb."DbT3006KyotakuKeikakuJigyoshaSakusei"."rirekiNo" = rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."rirekiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha" AS jgs ON jgs."jigyoshaNo" = rgdb."DbT3006KyotakuKeikakuJigyoshaSakusei"."keikakuJigyoshaNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha" AS itkjgs ON itkjgs."jigyoshaNo" = rgdb."DbT3006KyotakuKeikakuJigyoshaSakusei"."itakusakiJigyoshaNo" WHERE rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} UNION SELECT rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."taishoYM" AS 対象年月 , rgdb."DbT3007KyotakuKeikakuJikoSakusei"."sakuseiKubunCode" AS 作成区分コード , '' AS 事業者番号 , '' AS 事業者名 , '' AS 委託先情報者コード , '' AS 委託先情報者名 , rgdb."DbT3007KyotakuKeikakuJikoSakusei"."tekiyoKaishiYMD" AS 開始日 , rgdb."DbT3007KyotakuKeikakuJikoSakusei"."tekiyoShuryoYMD" AS 終了日 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeYMD" AS 届出日 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."lastUpdateTimestamp" AS 更新日 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."rirekiNo" AS 最大履歴番号 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeKubun" AS 届出区分 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeshaShimei" AS 氏名 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeshaShimeiKana" AS カナ , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeshaKankeiKubun" AS 関係区分 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeshaTelNo" AS 電話番号 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeshaYubinNo" AS 郵便番号 , rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."todokedeshaJusho" AS 住所 , rgdb."DbT3007KyotakuKeikakuJikoSakusei"."kyotaku_SogoJigyoKubun" AS 居宅・総合事業区分 , row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."hihokenshaNo", rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."taishoYM" ORDER BY rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."rirekiNo" DESC) AS 履歴順 FROM rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3007KyotakuKeikakuJikoSakusei" ON rgdb."DbT3007KyotakuKeikakuJikoSakusei"."hihokenshaNo" = rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."hihokenshaNo" AND rgdb."DbT3007KyotakuKeikakuJikoSakusei"."taishoYM" = rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."taishoYM" AND rgdb."DbT3007KyotakuKeikakuJikoSakusei"."rirekiNo" = rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."rirekiNo" WHERE rgdb."DbT3005KyotakuKeikakuTodokede"."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} ) AS A WHERE A.履歴順 ='1' ORDER BY A.対象年月 DESC

SELECT A.利用年月 , A.更新区分 , A.更新年月日 , A.送付年月 FROM( SELECT "riyoYM" as 利用年月 ,"koshinKubun" as 更新区分 ,"koshinYMD" as 更新年月日 ,"sofuYM" as 送付年月 FROM rgdb."DbT3010KyotakuKeikakuJikoSakuseiTankiNyushoRiyoNissu" WHERE "hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} AND "taishoYM" = #{対象年月} AND "rirekiNo" = #{履歴番号} UNION SELECT "riyoYM" as 利用年月 ,"koshinKubun" as 更新区分 ,"koshinYMD" as 更新年月日 ,"sofuYM" as 送付年月 FROM rgdb."DbT3013YoboKeikakuJikoSakuseiTankiRiyoNissu" WHERE "hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} AND "taishoYM" = #{対象年月} AND "rirekiNo" = #{履歴番号} ) AS A ORDER BY A."利用年月" DESC
